data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 2,315,596 people in Khulna who are far from you. Please add 463 new house churches this year.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Khulna, Khulna, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Khulna to agree with you and with one another.
Spirit, help the 2,904 believers find a person of peace today among the 2,315,596 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Khulna that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Namassej (Hindu traditions) people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Khulna, Khulna, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Khulna, Khulna, Bangladesh to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Khulna, Khulna, Bangladesh to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.
